snippet: The retooled credit, called Grow New Jersey, allows any company to apply regardless of its size or type, as long as it is considering leaving the state or moving there.
abstract: New Jersey is aggressively pushing revamped program to encourage businesses to stay or move within its borders; retooled tax credit, called Grow New Jersey, allows any company to apply regardless of its size or type, as long as it is considering leaving the state or moving there.
lead_paragraph: The retooled credit, called Grow New Jersey, allows any company to apply regardless of its size or type, as long as it is considering leaving the state or moving there.

headline.main: Tax Break as a Not-So-Secret Weapon
headline.print_headline: Tax Break as a Not-So-Secret Weapon
